name: Caravage
description:
Caravage allows you to check easily your design contrast accessibility with the 3.0 Web Content Accessibility Guidelines. Select a text layer and the plugin will automatically give you:

  • The colour(s) of the selection.
  • The colour(s) of the background directly behind the selection.
  • The font size and weight of the selection.
  • The contrast value based on WCAG 3.0 (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines) and the new colour contrast method called APCA (Advanced Perceptual Contrast Algorithm).
  • The minimum contrast value provided by the APCA contrast look up table.


Credits

  • This plugin was inspired by another plugin called Contrast.
  • This plugin use the Advanced Perceptual Contrast Algorithm.
  • This plugin use RGBQuant to analyze the colour(s) of the selected text and the background behind it.
  • This plugin use Figma Plugin DS, a lightweight UI library.
  • This plugin was made under the initiative of Biogen design team.
